maxValue.description: The upper value of some characteristic or property.

minValue.description: The lower value of some characteristic or property.

value.description:
The value of the quantitative value or property value node.

* For [[QuantitativeValue]] and [[MonetaryAmount]], the recommended type for values is 'Number'.
* For [[PropertyValue]], it can be 'Text;', 'Number', 'Boolean', or 'StructuredValue'.

currency.description: The currency in which the monetary amount is expressed (in 3-letter [ISO 4217](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_4217) format).
